--- title: "Intro to Biostatistics with R" subtitle: "Intensive summer workshop for life science PhD students" ## ------- general Output Options execute: eval: false echo: true # include source code in output warning: false # include warning code in output error: false # include error code in output output: false # include output code in output (CHG in BLOCKS) # include: false # R still runs but code and results DON"T appear in output # cache: false fig-cap-location: top tbl-cap-location: top toc: true format: html: code-fold: false # redundant IF echo false toc-depth: 2 toc_float: true toc-location: left toc-title: "" --- # Welcome! This website collects the materials for a four day workshop organized by [MITGEST Doctoral Network](https://www.mitgest.eu/) in July 2024, hosted by the Radboud Center for Mitochondrial Medicine, Nijmegen, Netherlands. - [Location:]{.smallcaps} Radboud Center for Mitochondrial Medicine, Nijmegen, Netherland - [Time:]{.smallcaps} 9 am - 4 pm July 24^th^ to July 27^th^, 2024. # Workshop Overview This Biostatistics workshop provides an introduction to selected topics in biostatistical concepts and reasoning. This course aims to introduce to the field and gives a solid understanding of data and data types, hypothesis testing and statistical inference applied to life sciences. Specific topics covered include: tools for describing central tendency and variability in data; methods for performing inference on population means and proportions via sample data; statistical hypothesis testing and its application to group comparisons; issues of power and sample size in study designs; elements of machine learning algorithms for understanding and classifying data. While there are some formulae and computational elements to the course, the emphasis is on applications of acquired concepts to “real life” of research scientists. Though the vast majority of what you will learn in this course can be applied in any software package, the seminar will use R for empirical examples and exercises. # Schedule ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
Day Time Activity
24 July, 2024 9am - 12am Lesson 1 ~ Working with data (with intro to R)
24 July, 2024 1pm - 4pm Practice Session 1
25 July, 2024 9am - 12am Lesson 2 ~ Inferential statistics
25 July, 2024 1pm - 4pm Practice Session 2
26 July, 2024 9am - 12am Lesson 3 ~ Modeling correlation and regression
26 July, 2024 1pm - 4pm Practice Session 3
27 July, 2024 9am - 12am Lesson 4 ~ Intro to machine learning (with R and MetaboAnalyst)
27 July, 2024 1pm - 4pm Practice Session 4
````` ::: ::: # Practical information Participants will need to bring their own laptop and make sure to have the required software installed ahead of the workshop. Step-by-step installation instructions are provided [here](https://r4biostats.com/install.html).
